radiographic_examinations.findings: Documents multiple episodes of non-sustained ventricular tachycardia (NSVT) lasting as long as 26 beats and records 4665 premature ventricular contractions.
Normal sinus rhythm, incomplete right bundle branch block, and multiple T-wave abnormalities.
Normal left ventricular function and chamber size, normal right ventricular function with its size at the upper limits of normal, and no valvular or pericardial abnormalities.
Normal coronary arteries and a normal left ventricular ejection fraction of >65%.

Borderline dilated left ventricle with normal LV mass and systolic function, right ventricle dilated with normal global right ventricular systolic function, distal one-third of the right ventricle is akinetic, with subendocardial delayed enhancement of the distal one-third of the right ventricle.
